name: Convocco
tag_list: interpreting, translation, language, services, linguistics, transcription
overview:
Convocco is a leading interpreting and translation company with an impressive nationwide network of interpreters, translators and clients.

Our proven track record of delivering the highest quality interpreting and translation services to local government, housing associations solicitors, tribunals and courts, charities and commercial companies speaks for itself.

Our leading edge services, delivered in over 250 languages, address all of your interpreting and translation requirements:

Face to Face Interpreting

Instant Access Telephone Interpreting

WebInterpreter - Video Conference Interpreting

Written Translations

Alternative Formats

We pride ourselves on a personal and immediate service, specifically tailored to your needs, not ours. Convocco is here for you 24x7, 365 days a year.

Our aim is to improve the quality/price performance of your current interpreting and translation service. You can experience what Convocco can deliver by talking to us about a trial period without any further commitments, contact us.

Our goal is simple: To improve every aspect of your current service whilst delivering better value for money.
